name: fuckyoufriday
text: "terror-laid". a coinage the world could perhaps have done without.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: A comment left by djwhiterabbit was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, divot, greatwhitehope7, wittyname, RedMange, NDCaesar, lk, GunsOfRay, whymog, LiquidCruelty, STUART)

name: pogo
text: Had to Google it, and came up with, "Our Green Terror laid eggs on a rock in our 55 gallon, i mean there must be hundreds of them."

name: sunday
text:
At first I said to myself, "Why would anyone Google such a terrible thing?" But then afterwards I did so as well.

After the requisite laying eggs bit, what I read said, "I noticed that the green terror was real buddy buddy with my convict for awhile. Can a green terror and a convict mate?"

I'm so. . .confused.

name: mnemodomi
text: How do fish... do it ???

name: fuzzyshoo
text:
There are several variations on this but typically, the females release eggs into the water, and the males will release sperm to fertilize them.

It is a very boring life, to be a fish.

name: carlyle
text: Seriously? Do they like swim back and forth really fast to mimic masturbation, or do they just get off whenever they want too?

name: wazza
text:
the sight of eggs covered in jelly excites a male fish.

SO MUCH.

name: slalvation
text: I five'd this strip just for "terror-laid."

name: geysershitdick
text: Todd grew up in Brooklyn. Most Squirrels do.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Fact: Most squirrels in Brooklyn never attain full growth.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Fact: As a black squirrel, Todd is probably from New England or Northwest Washington.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Squirrels leave in trees.

No one ever heard of a tree growing in Brooklyn.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
live dammit LIVE

(you'venevergivenuponanythinginyourlife!)

name: philophobe
text:
No?

[IMGS OFF]

Wasn't sure if you were making this joke or not, so how's about a benefit-of-the-doubt chubby?

name: fineoakstructure
text: (I was making the joke, but it's ok)

name: philophobe
text:
Like I said, benefit of the doubt. I really need to keep in mind that maybe 70% of the membership of this community could be described as "witty and urbane," with the other 30%, I don't know, maybe "gaseous and asinine"?

If only this proportion held for the Internet at large. Sigh.

name: greenkoolayd
text: get over yourself, pal.  youre no intellectual.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
word.

it's like you expect your reading Harper's Classics to mean something to us.

alternatively:
that book's cover design is just all sorts of wrong .

name: philophobe
text:
O, I've been served right in my pride . While in the process of complimenting most Achewood readers. By one for whom an apostrophe is apparently a leap year kinda thing.

Day-um.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i was just shooting off at the mouth, as it were(typing off at the mind?).

name: vulpes-aurum
text: That's not true! THAT'S IMPOSSIBLE!

name: fineoakstructure
text: Search your feelings, etc.

name: saint
text: IGNORANCE: it's not just for religious people anymore

name: a_dude
text: needing "bumps" aint cool... you will got buttshit apehole...

name: dusty
text: In that last panel he just goes on a tare of the lowest slang from every culture.

name: a_dude
text: A comment left by a_dude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by seven47, katsura, TheLoneliestMonkey, whitey)

name: salo
text: Nightlife Mingus pauses for effect.

name: totoro23
text: does todd go to all squirrel prisons/heavens? I feel that a prison filled with squirrels like todd would be particularly unbearable, although still hilarious stuff

name: norrin
text: I hope he goes to all squirrel prisons; otherwise, being terror laid by, say, a cat, would be just that much more terrible.

name: prine
text: I keep trying to read Todd's dialogue in the last panel and it just turns to white noise in my head halfway through. Is this just me? What the hell is he saying? I want to know!

name: geysershitdick
text: We can talk about that another day, fool! Give me twenty dollars; I need to snort a small portion of cocaine before I go crazy and throw up all over the floor.

name: fielding
text:
My first, momentary assumption, was that, rather than translating Todd-to-English, you were simply calling "prine" a fool, and informing him that his query did not carry the particular urgency which he had assigned it.

How appropriate , I thought.

name: achilleselbow
text:
Your original reading is still there, in the subtext of geysershitdick's response.

I just realized that there is something unsettling about trying to seriously discuss a post when the author of said post has chosen such an unfortunate moniker.

name: norsef
text:
I like to think that it's because you're not allowed to swear while at Heaven's "Wankers Rehabilitation Detox Ranch". So Todd had to work with interesting stencils in order to use his colorful language.
Sadly Todd isn't any good at anything including self censorship which is why an s cuss slips out.

name: norsef
text:
I like to think that it's because you're not allowed to swear while at Heaven's "Wankers Rehabilitation Detox Ranch". So Todd had to work with interesting stencils in order to use his colorful language.
Sadly Todd isn't any good at anything including self censorship which is why an s cuss slips out.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: "Terror Laid" is perhaps the worst kind of laid you can get.

name: sargasm
text:
SUCKIN' DICK

BOUGHT THIS SQUIRREL'S LIFE FOR ONE MORE DAY

text: "Todd came back from heaven completely addicted to horrible drugs" oh my word, this is poetry

text: I don't think we should assume that the alt-text implies that Todd wasn't completely addicted to horrible drugs prior to his stint in heaven.

name: mugi
text: Not completely, no.

name: woodenteeth
text: Coming down from Heaven is rough.

text: Todd was already addicted to horrible drugs before he went to heaven.

text: bitch-up

text: A comment left by vreeeee was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, SSDDR, makeitathing)

name: sargasm
text: I thought you died and went to heaven!  I hit you with the baseball bat myself!

name: tellumo
text: By your explicit request!

text: I'm waiting for the day I can use the phrase 'yerp onna frickin' floor' in everyday life :[

text: I'm waiting for the day I can say "I thought you died and went to heaven!"

name: equinn2006
text: Dark horse candidate for best Todd strip?

name: eatmorekix
text: no: "Todd Is On The Fuck Plan".

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Great alt-text. "Todd has come back from heaven completely addicted to horrible drugs."

name: cousinted
text:
Why can't we have eternal life?
And never die

name: firesign
text: I will assume you are referring to the best Entwistle-solo-tune-lifted-as-Who-concert-opener song ever, and award you a chubby to counteract the lames... Live at Leeds, much?

name: ford
text: Ass-Jack, Heaven-Bitch, Terror-Laid.  I give you, the three best hyphenated phrases in Achewood history.

name: techiebabe
text: Snot-cock is my all-time favorite, and has entered my everyday jargon.

name: professorhazard
text: I used to think I was the only person that enjoyed saying the word "buttshit". Then I read this strip.

name: dueledge
text: horrible drugs

name: techiebabe
text:
Schmendrick!!
Been a long time since I heard that referenced.

name: professorhazard
text: I myself watched The Last Unicorn roundabouts the time I first read this strip, so it all came together in a beautiful symmetry for me.

name: saulbellow
text:

name: anathan
text: I give it a five for the insult, "'syer mom still a putz?"

name: nielj
text: Ricky Craponi, Terror-laid, heaven-bitch, & buttshit apehole. I would definitely make at least one of these a band name.

name: fineoakstructure
text: And that band would sell 5 CD-R's with 3-songs (two of which are covers) to friend and family in their 18 weeks of existence.

text: todd has a way with words.
